channel.title: [PI] Need my shop cost "donor tickets" - Help
channel.description:
[b]I got donor shop, and i want if players click for example 'santa hat' it costs 2 Donator tickets($2), if someone clicked ags, 10 donator tickets. Each ticket = $1
If someone want a ticket he must pay me and i trade him 1 ticket or more then he can buy anything from shop, the ticket ID = 15714
Please help me with this:[/b]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/I1P1cEm.png[/img]
